usp.ime.gclib.hit

Class HitCalculations

  • java.lang.Object
    • usp.ime.gclib.hit.HitCalculations

  • public class HitCalculations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class calculate if a device hit another device
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Renato Avila e Tonny Cordeiro
    See Also:
    TargetRestrictions, ShootingRestrictions

        public boolean isValidTheDistanceBetweenDevices(Device srcDevice,
                                       Device dstDevice,
                                       double maximumDistanceSrcToDst)
        Verify if the distance between srcDevice and dstDevice is less then the maximumDistanceSrcToDst
        Parameters:
        srcDevice - Device with DeviceLocation not null
        dstDevice - Device with DeviceLocation not null
        maximumDistanceSrcToDst - maximum distance from source to destination in meters
        Returns:
        if the distance between srcDevice and dstDevice is less then the maximumDistanceSrcToDst

        Parameters:
